questions.a: A decentralized, transparent merge‚Äëmining pool. You keep control; we maximize your earnings by mining FLC and compatible coins together.

questions.q: What payout model do you use?
questions.a: PPLNS. Rewards are split by your valid shares within the window; payouts are made after each coin's network maturity. Every share and payout is tracked via [[link:shareNote]] for transparency.
FLC is the base. When merge mining is enabled, compatible coins are added automatically ‚Äî one setup, multiple rewards.
Point your miner to the Stratum URL with your wallet address as the username. No account needed. See the Pool Server section on this page.
After a block is found and the network maturity period passes. Payments and share credit are visible in the tracker with your address.
